description:
undo CL 6295073 / 1baa0597a876

Added new API and required relative new kernel without proper review.
See my comments on http://codereview.appspot.com/6295073.

««« original CL description
syscall: use 32 bits structure for Getrlimit/Setrlimit on 386/ARM.

Fixes issue 2492

R=rsc, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6295073

Committer: Brad Fitzpatrick <bradfitz@golang.org>
»»»

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

I misread the Getrlimit code - it does fall back if Prlimit is not
there. So the only objection remaining is the exporting of Prlimit
without explicit discussion. Han-Wen will send a CL unexporting that
function.

Russ

subject: code review 6447058: undo CL 6295073 / 1baa0597a876
